Field Description: Name of the organisation that is the asset owner and if not the owner the main user of the asset.
Schema Data Rules Comment: Name of the Organisation's area coverage. Would be beneficial if added to all the datasets
FormatReference: Name of the Organisation's area coverage.

Field Description: A unique code to identify the asset owning/using organisation.   For LAs this can be the URI from Open Data Communities.
Date at which the information provided is true.
Schema Data Rules Comment: Include this field to show the publication date of the dataset (ie. the date on which the dataset's information is true).

Field Description: TRUE where the data is the latest for the indicator.  Else blank.
Dataset time period start, or start of accounting/reporting period.  DurationFrom will always include a Time of 00:00:00.
Schema Data Rules Comment: Dataset time period start, or start of accounting/reporting period.  DurationFrom will always include a Time of 00:00:00.

Field Description: Dataset time period end, or end of accounting/reporting period.
Schema Data Rules Comment: Dataset time period end, or end of accounting/reporting period.

Field Description: The type of time period the data record covers (eg. Financial Year, Calendar Year, Month, Quarter)
Schema Data Rules Comment: The type of time period the data record covers (eg. Financial Year, Calendar Year, Month, Quarter)
Example: eg. Financial Year, Calendar Year, Month, Quarter

Field Description: ONS geography identifier for the geography in which the data is located
ONS geography name for the geography in which the data is located
ONS geography linked data URI for the geography in which the data is located
Year for which the Value will either be Actual (has been measured), or is Projected
Pupil numbers or School Capacity (PAN - Pupil Admission Numbers)
